headline: Here’s What Analysts Think About Fortinet (FTNT)
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one of the best long term growth stocks to buy according to hedge funds. Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) received rating updates from RBC Capital and Piper Sandler on January 5. RBC Capital reiterated a Hold rating on the stock and set a price target of $85, while Piper Sandler lifted the price target […]
